content: Hello cargo team, can we mark experience requirements for more issues, because I have wanted to help solve issues for some time, but it is difficult to do so because I am not quite able to assess the experience requirements. Also there are a lot of issues in the cargo repository, and sometimes it's hard to tell if the issue needs to be fixed or if contributions are welcome. So maybe we could mark experience requirements for more issues? Also, thank you all for maintaining cargo! :heart:
When we have time we mark things with the E-* labels. For better and worse they tend to get snapped up pretty quickly.

I do issue triage about once a month, and I will probably do it later this week or next. I do try to set the E labels when possible. Almost all issues in the tracker that aren't E labeled are either not clear if it should be addressed, or not clear what the problem is, or not clear how difficult it would be to fix, or a low priority that I don't want to expend effort on.
Thank you! Much appreciated! :heart:
